forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny this afternoon. High 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to afternoon sunshine. High 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thundershowers likely. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers and thundershowers likely. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers along with windy conditions. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain showers. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.
